connector.description:
Allows to get tweets from the timeline of a specific user from Twitter.

It requires tokens that can be obtained by creating an application 
in the Twitter developer portal: https://developer.twitter.com/.

camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.us.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.user
camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.us.description: The user we want to read the timeline Example: ApacheCamel

camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ap.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.apiKey
camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ap.description: The API Key from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ap.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.apiKeySecret
camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ap.description: The API Key Secret from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ac.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.accessToken
camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ac.description: The Access Token from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ac.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.accessTokenSecret
camel.kamelet.twitter-timeline-source.ac.description: The Access Token Secret from the Twitter application in the developer portal
